snippet: The Bergdahl swap highlights how inmates are hostage to politics.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Ramzi Kassem describes how detainees at Guantanamo Bay empathize with Sgt Bowe Bergdahl and his family; notes that inmates find controversy over Bergdahl's release incomprehensible, and believe that American public should question whether detention and abuse at Guantanamo are lawful; calls on Pres Obama to resettle and repatriate as many Guantanamo inmates as possible and give fair trials to those that remain.
lead_paragraph: The Bergdahl swap highlights how inmates are hostage to politics.
